definition: cleavage (splitting of minerals such as slate along planes)
acrobatic display (esp. on horseback) (old)/variant of 懈[xie4] and 邂[xie4] (old)
to divide/to break up/to split/to separate/to dissolve/to solve/to melt/to remove/to untie/to loosen/to open/to emancipate/to explain/to understand/to know/a solution/a dissection
texture/grain (of wood)/inner essence/intrinsic order/reason/logic/truth/science/natural science (esp. physics)/to manage/to pay attention to/to run (affairs)/to handle/to put in order/to tidy up

sentences.english: The surface of delamination crack is of cleavage fracture appearance with large cleavage face.
sentences.chinese: 分层裂纹表面为解理形貌，解理面较大。

sentences.english: The surface of delamination crack is of cleavage fracture appearance with large cleavage face.
sentences.chinese: 分层裂纹表面为解理形貌，解理面较大。

sentences.english: The fractures of the alloys change from dimple to cleavage fracture with river pattern.
sentences.chinese: 合金的断口形貌由韧窝向河流花纹状的解理形貌转变。

sentences.english: Fracture measurements show that the mode attributed to cleavage fracture.
sentences.chinese: 断口实验结果表明，接头断裂模式为解理断裂。

sentences.english: The nucleated cracks cannot propagate and the cleavage fracture cannot be triggered.
sentences.chinese: 因此形核的裂纹因不能扩展而不能引发解理断裂。

sentences.english: The thermal fatigue fracture belongs to cleavage fracture.
sentences.chinese: 热疲劳断口具有穿晶解理特征。

sentences.english: The two cleaved facets define the fabry-perot cavity.
sentences.chinese: 这两个解理面限定了法布里珀罗光腔。

sentences.english: The fractograph of dynamic electrochemical charging during the SSRT displays with a quasi-cleavage mode.
sentences.chinese: 慢拉伸的动态电化学充氢断口出现准解理断裂。

sentences.english: The cleavage facture stress of notched specimen is much higher than that of smooth specimen.
sentences.chinese: 切口试样测得的解理断裂应力明显高于光滑试样。

sentences.english: Scanning electron microscope examination shows that the fractured surfaceschanges from the quasi-cleavage type to the cleavage type.
sentences.chinese: 断口的扫描电子金相从准解理型过渡到解理型。

sentences.english: Scanning electron microscope examination shows that the fractured surfaceschanges from the quasi-cleavage type to the cleavage type.
sentences.chinese: 断口的扫描电子金相从准解理型过渡到解理型。

sentences.english: The lay of the strata can imply that the rock splits easily along its direction of cleavage .
sentences.chinese: 成层的地层意味着岩石易于沿着其解理方向裂开。

sentences.english: The local cleavage fracture stress is mainly determined by the length of the critical microcrack.
sentences.chinese: 细观解理断裂应力主要由临界裂纹的长度决定。

sentences.english: Look at these grains. They have twins and perfect cleavages.
sentences.chinese: 看看这些红色矿物颗粒，它们具有双晶以及完全解理。

sentences.english: Sometimes cleavage fractures originate at the WC particle surface.
sentences.chinese: 有时在WC颗粒表面出现解理断口。

definition: a block/body of person or animal as a block
ultrabasic rock (geology, rock containing less than 45 percent silicates)
cubical system (crystallography)/crystal system based on cubic lattice/equiaxial crystal system
orthoclase KAlSi3O8 (rock-forming mineral, type of feldspar)
